description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; a man in a black coat and hat stands bent over with his hands outstretched to his sides; he is holding a rolled piece of paper in his hand on the left; a building with windows is in the background
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: 3 Probedruck. 3. E 58-II.-A | ULC of sheet, in pencil: 4) | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 3 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2414
portfolio: From Plate 4 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : \"der Mantel\"
title: Akaki Walks Perplexed on the Street, Plate 4 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
